meta_title: What is Vibration Monitoring? The 2026 Guide to Asset Health
meta_description: Discover what vibration monitoring is, how AI has democratized it, and why it is the cornerstone of modern predictive maintenance strategies.
title: What is Vibration Monitoring? From "Dark Art" to Actionable Insight

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Vibration Monitoring? From "Dark Art" to Actionable Insight

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse maintenance technician (wearing a hard hat, safety glasses, and high-visibility vest) is inspecting a large industrial electric motor. The technician is looking at a tablet held in their hand (screen not visible to camera), while pointing a wireless vibration sensor attached to the cooling fins of the motor. The background shows blurred production lines with soft, cool industrial lighting. The image conveys technology, precision, and safety. No text or overlays.
